name: Naintilus
description:
Summary

You are a garden gnome. Your mission: dive as deep as possible in the pool, dodging or destroying ennemies otherwise you'll get smashed out.

We a are a team of 7 people who wanted to propose a cute little game, place in the perspective of a kid with intriguing imagination. We hope you'll enjoy your dive :)

The game might grow later after the jam, so don't hesitate to follow its evolution :D !

Credits

  • Alize MARTINEZ  : 3D Artist
  • Benjamin LE ROUX : 2D Artist + Animation
  • Charles POTIER  : 2D Artist + Animation
  • Emmanuel BARREAU  : Developer
  • Leo FORET : Developer + VFX
  • Lise EDELINE : SFX 
  • Remi PIEROT : Music Composer
